item.cobblecoins.cobblecoin.description: A small, low-value coin made from cobblestone.
item.cobblecoins.cobblenote.description: A note worth 64 Cobblecoins. Useful for larger transactions.
item.cobblecoins.cobblewad.description: A wad worth 64 Cobblenotes (4096 Cobblecoins). For bulk value storage.
